message.name: ERR_POSITIONHOLDER_RV_ORGSTRUCTURE_CANCELED
message.locale: A user cannot be added to a position within a canceled organization structure.
A user cannot be added to a position within a cancelled organisation structure.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONHOLDER_RV_USER_CANCELED
message.locale: A canceled user cannot be added to a position.
A cancelled user cannot be added to a position.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONHOLDER_RV_POSITION_CANCELED
message.locale: A user cannot be added to a canceled position.
A user cannot be added to a cancelled position.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONHOLDER_XRV_USER_ALREADY_ASSIGNED
message.locale: This user has already been added to this position.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONHOLDER_XRV_USER_NOT_ASSIGNED
message.locale: This user does not hold this position.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONHOLDER_FV_USER_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A user name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONHOLDER_FV_ASSIGNUSER_TODATE_INVALID
message.locale: A user cannot be assigned to a position which has an end date of today or in the past.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONHOLDER_XRV_ASSIGNUSER_USER_IS_CLOSED
message.locale: A closed user cannot be added to a position.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONHOLDER_XRV_REMOVEUSER_USER_CASE_OWNER
message.locale: This user is the owner of one or more cases and therefore cannot be removed from the position.
